item.description:
Our next afternoon meet up will be at Borders Books from 3:30 pm -5:30 PM. Food and drinks available here.

Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the cafe, I will have sign up!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday afternoon study group( downtown boston)
